TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit StaticResourceExtension extends System.Windows.Markup.MarkupExtension

summary.span: 实现一个标记扩展，该标记扩展支持根据 XAML 制作的静态（XAML 加载时）资源引用。

span.span: Implements a markup extension that supports static (XAML load time) resource references made from XAML.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类是标记扩展实现。This class is a markup extension implementation. 在 WPF 中的标记扩展类存在主要是为了提供基础结构支持的某些方面[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]XAML 处理器实现中，并由标记扩展公开的成员不通常称为从用户代码。Markup extension classes in WPF exist mainly to provide infrastructure support for some aspect of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] XAML processor implementation, and the members exposed by a markup extension are not typically called from user code. 此扩展插件支持[StaticResource 标记扩展](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/staticresource-markup-extension.md)从 XAML 的使用情况。This extension supports the [StaticResource Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/staticresource-markup-extension.md) usage from XAML. 在 WPF XAML 中的静态资源查找的机制的详细信息，请参阅[StaticResource 标记扩展](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/staticresource-markup-extension.md)或[XAML 资源](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources.md)。For more information on the mechanics of static resource lookup in WPF XAML, see [StaticResource Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/staticresource-markup-extension.md) or [XAML Resources](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources.md). `{StaticResource}` 是特定于 XAML 的 WPF 实现标记扩展。`{StaticResource}` is a markup extension that is specific to the WPF implementation of XAML. 可以使用`{StaticResource}`对于 WPF，引用默认 XAML 命名空间，而无需使用前缀时。You can use `{StaticResource}` when referencing the default XAML namespace for WPF, without using a prefix. 与此相反，为 XAML 语言定义的标记扩展支持 (如`{x:Type}`) 需要使用情况中的 XAML 语言 XAML 命名空间前缀。In contrast, markup extensions that are defined for XAML language support (such as `{x:Type}`) require the prefix for the XAML language XAML namespace in the usage. 有关详细信息，请参阅[标记扩展和 WPF XAML](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/markup-extensions-and-wpf-xaml.md)。For more information, see [Markup Extensions and WPF XAML](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/markup-extensions-and-wpf-xaml.md). 在 XAML 中通常使用静态资源引用每当[DynamicResource 标记扩展](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dynamicresource-markup-extension.md)不是显式必需的。Static resource references are generally used in XAML whenever a [DynamicResource Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dynamicresource-markup-extension.md) is not explicitly necessary.

span.span: Returns an object that should be set on the property where this extension is applied.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法支持[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]XAML 处理器实现中，并且不应直接调用。This method supports [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] XAML processor implementation, and is not intended to be called directly. XAML 处理器实现使用此方法以便正确处理`StaticResource`对象创建期间的扩展值。The XAML processor implementation uses this method for proper handling of `StaticResource` extension values during object creation. 要设置的属性可以由标识（标准属性） 或（依赖项属性）。The property to be set can be identified by a (standard property) or (dependency property). 此实现依赖于 XAML 相关服务基于已传递`serviceProvider`。This implementation relies on XAML-related services based on the passed `serviceProvider`. 不能`null`。It must not be `null`. 在[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]实现中，以下是从服务上下文所需的服务：In the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] implementation, the following are required services from service context: - - - 如果缺少任何这些服务，标记扩展的使用情况将引发异常。If any of these services are missing, usage of the markup extension throws an exception.

exception.span: 为 ，或未能实现所需服务。

span.span: was , or failed to implement a required service.

summary.span: 获取或设置此静态资源引用传递的键值。

span.span: Gets or sets the key value passed by this static resource reference.

summary.span: 该键用于返回与资源字典中的键匹配的对象。

span.span: They key is used to return the object matching that key in resource dictionaries.
The resource key for a resource.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]使用情况信息，请参阅[StaticResource 标记扩展](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/staticresource-markup-extension.md)。For [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] usage information, see [StaticResource Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/staticresource-markup-extension.md).
